subject: Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: The British cyclist Chris Froome maintained a commanding lead Saturday, all but assuring he will win the 100th Tour de France when it finishes in Paris on Sunday.
snippet: The British cyclist Chris Froome maintained a commanding lead Saturday, all but assuring he will win the 100th Tour de France when it finishes in Paris on Sunday.
